short_summary: Electrical Work - Fire Alarm System Update
description: The Canadian Space Agency requires the services of a general contractor, qualified to practise and holding a Quebec permit, to provide the necessary services in order to upgrade fire alarm system at the John H. Chapman Centre. For further details, graduates students and educational institution should contact the agency at secretariat to asquests universityAcademy Challenge[\
